title.rendered: IHW Council recognises Smile as ‘Health-Focused NGO of the Year’

content.rendered: Smile Foundation received the ‘Health-Focused NGO of the Year’ award at CSR Health Awards 2024, organized by the health and wellbeing think tank, the IHW Council. This award recognizes our healthcare program’s extensive reach across 17 states in India, including aspirational districts, remote villages, and underserved urban communities. Our comprehensive and community-centric health program delivers primary healthcare services directly to the doorsteps of underserved populations in both rural and urban areas, addressing critical gaps in healthcare availability, accessibility, and affordability.
